  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1763</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Il colore genetico degli occhi</string>
            <string language="en">Gene-colour of the eyes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gen-Farbe der Augen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gène-couleur des yeux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gene-cor dos olhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γονίδιο-χρώμα των ματιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gene-color de los ojos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Che colore dell'occhio il bambino otterrà? Se la madre ha gli occhi marroni e il padre gli occhi blu, quali probabilità ha il bambino di avere  gli occhi blu? Controlla.</string>
            <string language="en">What eye colour will the child get?
If the mother has brown eyes and the father blue eyes, what are the chances for the child to get blue eyes? Check it out .</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">gene</string>
            <string language="en">gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">colore degli occhi</string>
            <string language="en">colour of the eyes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welche Auge Farbe wird das Kind get?If, welches die
Mutter braune Augen und die blauen Augen des Vaters hat, was sind die 
Wahrscheinlichkeiten, damit das Kind blaue Augen erhält? 
Überprüfen Sie sie heraus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle couleur d'oeil le get?If d'enfant que la 
mère a les yeux bruns et les yeux bleus de père, que sont les 
chances pour que l'enfant obtienne-t-il les yeux bleus ? 
Contrôlez-la dehors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que cor do olho  o get?If que a matriz tem os 
olhos marrons e os olhos azuis do pai, que da criança é as 
possibilidades para que a criança comece os olhos azuis? 
Verifique-a para fora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τί χρώμα ματιών το παιδί get?If η μητέρα έχει τα 
καφετιά μάτια και τον πατέρα που τα μπλε μάτια, τι είναι οι 
πιθανότητες για το παιδί να πάρει τα μπλε μάτια; Τον 
ελέγξτε έξω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué color del ojo  el get?If que la madre tiene 
ojos marrones y los ojos azules del padre, qué del niño es las 
ocasiones para que el niño consiga ojos azules? Contrólelo 
hacia fuera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe der Augen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couleur des yeux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cor dos olhos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γονίδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρώμα των ματιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">color de los ojos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
